languages.text: Сложность спасброска от опутывания веббером уменьшается на 10

traits.locale_text: Сложность спасброска от опутывания веббером уменьшается на 10

languages.text: Targets of the webbers must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Targets of the webbers must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

Targets of the webbers must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

languages.text: Цели сетемета совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусом{/g} +10 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g}.
languages.original_text: Targets of the webbers must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Цели сетемета совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусом{/g} +10 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g}.

Цели сетемета совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусом{/g} +10 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g}.

languages.text: Los objetivos de los lanzarredes deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +10 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g}.
languages.original_text: Targets of the webbers must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los objetivos de los lanzarredes deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +10 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g}.

languages.text: ウェバーのターゲットは、+10{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: Targets of the webbers must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ウェバーのターゲットは、+10{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。

languages.text: 捕网枪的攻击目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: Targets of the webbers must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 捕网枪的攻击目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态。

languages.text: Ziele der Spinner müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +10 bestehen, um nicht {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} zu werden.
languages.original_text: Targets of the webbers must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ziele der Spinner müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +10 bestehen, um nicht {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} zu werden.

languages.text: Les cibles des lance-toiles doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +10. En cas d'échec, elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}.
languages.original_text: Targets of the webbers must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les cibles des lance-toiles doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +10. En cas d'échec, elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}.

Les cibles des lance-toiles doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +10. En cas d'échec, elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}.

languages.text: Ağdolayanların hedefleri, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusa{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmek zorundadır. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olurlar.
languages.original_text: Targets of the webbers must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.
